page.title: 06MY HOUSE
page.content: My house is the end one of a{terrace of 4 houses.It is made of{brick}and has 3 bedrooms and a{toilet}and bath- room upstairs.Downstairs there is a sitting room,a dining room and a kit- chen.Mum and my dad and my sister and me live in my house. By {LISA MARSHALL {OUR STREET By Sally Robinson Our street is a{cul-de-sac}and has lots of semi-detached houses in it.It is called{Coppicewood Crescent}and it has grass verges.Our street is not a busy one because it is only used by the people who live there.Eight families have{children,}14 in all,and one family has none.Each family has a car and a garage.Two of them are double.Ours is and we have two cars. {MORRISON'S By ANGELA AND HELEN DAVIS It is a big supermarket with wine and grocery and household sections.165 people work there and 200 at Christmas
